  16. (* Loading and installation of user-defined printer functions *)

  18. open Misc
  19. open Types

  21. (* Error report *)

  23. ‌type error =
  24.   | Load_failure of Dynlink.error
  25.   | Unbound_identifier of Longident.t
  26.   | Unavailable_module of string * Longident.t
  27.   | Wrong_type of Longident.t
  28.   | No_active_printer of Longident.t

  30. exception Error of error

  32. (* Load a .cmo or .cma file *)

  34. open Format

  36. ‌let rec loadfiles ppf name =
  37.   try
  38.     let filename = Load_path.find name in
  39.     Dynlink.allow_unsafe_modules true;
  40.     Dynlink.loadfile filename;
  41.     let d = Filename.dirname name in
  42.     if d <> Filename.current_dir_name then begin
  43.       if not (List.mem d (Load_path.get_paths ())) then
  44.         Load_path.add_dir d;
  45.     end;
  46.     fprintf ppf "File %s loaded@."
  47.       (if d <> Filename.current_dir_name then
  48.          filename
  49.        else
  50.          Filename.basename filename);
  51.     true
  52.   with
  53.   | Dynlink.Error (Dynlink.Unavailable_unit unit) ->
  54.       loadfiles ppf (String.uncapitalize_ascii unit ^ ".cmo")
  55.         &&
  56.       loadfiles ppf name
  57.   | Not_found ->
  58.       fprintf ppf "Cannot find file %s@." name;
  59.       false
  60.   | Sys_error msg ->
  61.       fprintf ppf "%s: %s@." name msg;
  62.       false
  63.   | Dynlink.Error e ->
  64.       raise(Error(Load_failure e))

  66. ‌let loadfile ppf name =
  67.   ignore(loadfiles ppf name)

  69. (* Return the value referred to by a path (as in toplevel/topdirs) *)
  70. (* Note: evaluation proceeds in the debugger memory space, not in
  71.    the debuggee. *)

  73. ‌let rec eval_address = function
  74.   | Env.Aident id ->
  75.     assert (Ident.persistent id);
  76.     let bytecode_or_asm_symbol = Ident.name id in
  77.     begin match Dynlink.unsafe_get_global_value ~bytecode_or_asm_symbol with
  78.     | None ->
  79.       raise (Symtable.Error (Symtable.Undefined_global bytecode_or_asm_symbol))
  80.     | Some obj -> obj
  81.     end
  82.   | Env.Adot(addr, pos) -> Obj.field (eval_address addr) pos

  84. ‌let eval_value_path env path =
  85.   match Env.find_value_address path env with
  86.   | addr -> eval_address addr
  87.   | exception Not_found ->
  88.       fatal_error ("Cannot find address for: " ^ (Path.name path))

  90. (* Install, remove a printer (as in toplevel/topdirs) *)

  92. ‌let match_printer_type desc make_printer_type =
  93.   Ctype.with_local_level ~post:Ctype.generalize begin fun () ->
  94.     let ty_arg = Ctype.newvar() in
  95.     Ctype.unify Env.empty
  96.       (make_printer_type ty_arg)
  97.       (Ctype.instance desc.val_type);
  98.     ty_arg
  99.   end

  101. let find_printer_type lid =
  102.   match Env.find_value_by_name lid Env.empty with
  103.   | (path, desc) -> begin
  104.       match match_printer_type desc Topprinters.printer_type_new with
  105.       | ty_arg -> (ty_arg, path, false)
  106.       | exception Ctype.Unify _ -> begin
  107.           match match_printer_type desc Topprinters.printer_type_old with
  108.           | ty_arg -> (ty_arg, path, true)
  109.           | exception Ctype.Unify _ -> raise(Error(Wrong_type lid))
  110.         end
  111.     end
  112.   | exception Not_found ->
  113.       raise(Error(Unbound_identifier lid))

  115. ‌let install_printer ppf lid =
  116.   let (ty_arg, path, is_old_style) = find_printer_type lid in
  117.   let v =
  118.     try
  119.       eval_value_path Env.empty path
  120.     with Symtable.Error(Symtable.Undefined_global s) ->
  121.       raise(Error(Unavailable_module(s, lid))) in
  122.   let print_function =
  123.     if is_old_style then
  124.       (fun _formatter repr -> Obj.obj v (Obj.obj repr))
  125.     else
  126.       (fun formatter repr -> Obj.obj v formatter (Obj.obj repr)) in
  127.   Printval.install_printer path ty_arg ppf print_function

  129. ‌let remove_printer lid =
  130.   let (_ty_arg, path, _is_old_style) = find_printer_type lid in
  131.   try
  132.     Printval.remove_printer path
  133.   with Not_found ->
  134.     raise(Error(No_active_printer lid))

  136. (* Error report *)

  138. open Format

  140. ‌let report_error ppf = function
  141.   | Load_failure e ->
  142.       fprintf ppf "@[Error during code loading: %s@]@."
  143.         (Dynlink.error_message e)
  144.   | Unbound_identifier lid ->
  145.       fprintf ppf "@[Unbound identifier %a@]@."
  146.       Printtyp.longident lid
  147.   | Unavailable_module(md, lid) ->
  148.       fprintf ppf
  149.         "@[The debugger does not contain the code for@ %a.@ \
  150.            Please load an implementation of %s first.@]@."
  151.         Printtyp.longident lid md
  152.   | Wrong_type lid ->
  153.       fprintf ppf "@[%a has the wrong type for a printing function.@]@."
  154.       Printtyp.longident lid
  155.   | No_active_printer lid ->
  156.       fprintf ppf "@[%a is not currently active as a printing function.@]@."
  157.       Printtyp.longident lid
